Player History
Drafted in 23rd round, 360th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off David Gerrish (CHI)...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Houston on 6/5/2015 (Going to HOU: SS Terry Corcoran. Going to SLB: P Heath Oconner)...
Injured on 8/28/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/2015, off Alejandro Plante (KC)...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 3/2/2016 (Going to CIN: SS Terry Corcoran. Going to HOU: 1B Robert Weitzman, RF Andres Caban)...
Injured on 6/3/2016 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $3,170,000 per year...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 3/2/2019 (Going to HOU: SS Benjamin Bellido. Going to DET: SS Terry Corcoran)...
